custom_css: .banner__heading {font-family: times new romans, serif; color: white;}

settings.custom_liquid:
<style> 
  #Slider-template--23980392284435__featured_collection_GwPJPQ, 
  #Slider-template--23980392284435__featured_collection_WPMLGE, 
  #Slider-template--23980392284435__featured_collection_jmapAg {
    user-select: none; 
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; 
    overflow-x: auto; 
    scroll-snap-type: none;  
    scroll-behavior: smooth; 
  } 
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {

  const carousels = document.querySelectorAll(
    '#Slider-template--23980392284435__featured_collection_GwPJPQ, ' + 
    '#Slider-template--23980392284435__featured_collection_WPMLGE, ' + 
    '#Slider-template--23980392284435__featured_collection_jmapAg'
  );

  // Check if the screen is larger than 768px to only enable the dragging on desktop
  const isDesktop = window.innerWidth > 768;

  if (isDesktop) {
    carousels.forEach(carousel => {
      let isMouseDown = false;
      let isDragging = false;
      let startX;
      let scrollLeft;

      carousel.style.cursor = 'grab';

      carousel.addEventListener('mousedown', function (e) {
        isMouseDown = true;
        isDragging = false; // Reset dragging state
        startX = e.pageX - carousel.offsetLeft;
        scrollLeft = carousel.scrollLeft;

        setTimeout(() => {
          if (isMouseDown) {
            isDragging = true;
            carousel.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
            carousel.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => link.style.pointerEvents = 'none'); // Disable link clicks
          }
        }, 200); // 0.8 second delay to initiate dragging
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('mouseleave', function () {
        if (isMouseDown) resetState(carousel);
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('mouseup', function () {
        if (isMouseDown) resetState(carousel);
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('mousemove', function (e) {
        if (!isMouseDown || !isDragging) return;

        e.preventDefault(); // Prevent text selection while dragging

        const x = e.pageX - carousel.offsetLeft;
        const walk = x - startX;

        carousel.scrollLeft = scrollLeft - walk;
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('touchstart', function (e) {
        const touchStart = e.touches[0].pageX; 
        let touchMove;

        carousel.addEventListener('touchmove', function (e) {
          touchMove = e.touches[0].pageX; 
          const moveDistance = touchStart - touchMove;
          carousel.scrollLeft += moveDistance;
        });

        carousel.addEventListener('touchend', function () {
          carousel.removeEventListener('touchmove', null);
          carousel.removeEventListener('touchend', null);
        });
      });

      function resetState(carousel) {
        isMouseDown = false;
        isDragging = false;
        carousel.style.cursor = 'grab';
        carousel.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => link.style.pointerEvents = 'auto'); // Re-enable link clicks
      }
    });
  } else {
    // For mobile devices, disable the touch events entirely
    carousels.forEach(carousel => {
      carousel.removeEventListener('touchstart', null);
      carousel.removeEventListener('touchmove', null);
      carousel.removeEventListener('touchend', null);
    });
  }
});
</script>

settings.heading: Shop Reusable Water Bottles
settings.row_content:
Looking for a stylish and sustainable way to stay hydrated? frank green's reusable bottles will quench your thirst while being kind to the planet. Our aesthetic water bottles are made using premium BPA-free materials, are ceramic lined, and triple-wall vacuum insulated for those refreshingly cold or comfortingly hot drinks on-the-go. Our Flip Straw Lids make it even easier to sip anywhere, anytime. Swish them around in some soapy water, dry and it’s ready to use (again). 

The best part? frank green bottles are interchangeable—switch it up by mixing and matching colours to suit your style, outfit or mood. From the base, lids, straw lid and reusable straw lid strap, you have total control over your frank green look. Speaking of lids, our reusable drink bottles come with your choice of straw lids or our multi award-winning push button lids—it all comes down to your preferred sipping style.

settings.heading: What are BPA free drink bottles?
settings.row_content: BPA free water bottles are crafted using high-quality materials free from the chemical bisphenol A (BPA), which is often used in the production of plastic products. At frank green, you can sip with confidence knowing your insulated water bottle is 100% BPA-free and safe for you to use.

settings.heading: Can I put hot liquids in a reusable water bottle?
settings.row_content: When it comes to your frank green insulated drink bottle, you can do it all:hot coffeeandcold teas, and everything in-between. Just remember, if it’s hot, we recommend opting for apush-button lid! Thanks to its triple-wall vacuum insulation, your drink stays warmer or cooler for longer, and its spill-proof design makes it impervious to roller-coasters or being used as maracas.

settings.heading: Are reusable water bottles safe to use?
settings.row_content: Yes, our reusable stainless steel bottles are safe to use. Thanks to being BPA-free, and made from FDA and EU approved materials, your frank green bottle can be with you for years to come. Not only does this make it safe for everyday use, its ceramic lining and triple-wall vacuum insulation means you can lock in your hot or cold drink—and its flavour—for hours!

settings.heading: How often should I wash my drink bottles?
settings.row_content: We recommend giving your frank green insulated water bottle a quick wash after each use to keep it fresh for your next refill.Cleaning your frank green steel or ceramic water bottleis easy-peasy. Simply pop it in some soapy water, give it a wipe over with a soft sponge and either air dry or wipe dry with a towel. You can also add your drink bottle lid to the dishwasher for an even easier clean.

settings.heading: Discover more sustainable products by frank green
settings.row_content: Love shopping at frank green? take a look at some of our other popular collections: personalised water bottles, insulated bottles, water bottles with a straw, and reusable straws.

custom_css: .accordion summary {padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; border-bottom: 2px solid #000; margin-bottom: 10px;}
